TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolBarButton extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 表示一个 Windows 工具栏按钮。

span.span: Represents a Windows toolbar button.

summary.span: 尽管 替换并扩展了早期版本的 控件，但也可以选择保留 以备向后兼容性和将来使用。

span.span: Although replaces and extends the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件作为其父级控件。 controls are parented by controls. 常见的属性设置创建工具栏按钮后是和。Common properties to set once the toolbar button has been created are and . 设置显示文本下方或图像的右侧的按钮属性。Set the property of the button to display text beneath or to the right of the image. 要分配给按钮的映像，通过创建，将其分配给属性工具栏; 然后将分配到的映像索引值该按钮的属性。To assign images to the buttons by creating an , assigning it to the property of the toolbar; then assign the image index value to the property of the button. 若要更改分配给工具栏的工具栏按钮的外观，设置父工具栏控件的属性。To change the appearance of the toolbar buttons assigned to the toolbar, set the property of the parent toolbar control. `ToolBarAppearance.Flat`外观使按钮平面的外观。The `ToolBarAppearance.Flat` appearance gives the buttons a flat appearance. 为鼠标指针移过的按钮，他们对三维的外观更改。As the mouse pointer moves over the buttons, their appearance changes to three-dimensional. 按钮分隔符显示为线，而不是当按钮具有平面外观时，按钮之间的空格。Button separators appear as lines rather than spaces between the buttons when the buttons have a flat appearance. 如果属性设置为`ToolBarAppearance.Normal`，按钮显示引发的三维效果，和分隔符将显示为按钮之间的间距。If the property is set to `ToolBarAppearance.Normal`, the buttons appear raised and three-dimensional, and the separators appear as a gap between the buttons. 你可以分配至一个按钮如果属性设置为`ToolBarButtonStyle.DropDown`。You can assign a to a button if the property is set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.DropDown`. 单击该按钮，显示分配的菜单。When the button is clicked, the assigned menu is displayed. 若要创建的集合控件以显示有关，通过使用单独添加按钮方法属性。To create a collection of controls to display on a , add the buttons individually by using the method of the property. 或者，可以添加多个工具栏按钮使用方法。Alternatively, you can add several toolbar buttons using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和三个控件。The following code example creates a and three controls. 工具栏按钮分配给按钮集合，集合将分配到工具栏，而工具栏添加到窗体。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the button collection, the collection is assigned to the toolbar, and the toolbar is added to the form. 上事件工具栏上，属性计算和相应的对话框打开。On the event of the toolbar, the property of the is evaluated and the appropriate dialog box opened. 此代码需要、 、 ，和一个所有已创建。This code requires that a , an , a , and a have all been created. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBar.ToolBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个新创建没有默认或分配给它。A newly created has no default or assigned to it. 按钮的默认样式是`ToolBarButtonStyle.PushButton`。The button's default style is `ToolBarButtonStyle.PushButton`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的常见属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要， ，和已创建与至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and displays the assigned text on the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新创建未包含任何分配给它。The newly created has no assigned to it. 按钮的默认样式是。The button's default style is . `text`参数分配给属性并在新的工具栏按钮控件上显示。The `text` parameter is assigned to the property and is displayed on the new toolbar button control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的常见属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要， ，和已创建与至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以指定时单击该下拉列表按钮时显示。You can specify a to be displayed when the drop-down button is clicked. 除非未使用此属性属性值设置为。This property is not used unless the property value is set to . > [!NOTE] > 尽管属性被定义为类型，你必须将其分配它才能正确显示。Although the property is defined as a type, you must assign it a for it to display properly. 如果你正在创建你自己派生的类必须将分配到该对象并分配到属性。If you are creating your own derived class you must assign that object to a and assign the to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的常见属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要，和已创建与至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that an , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用此按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用此按钮，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the button is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`false`、 不能单击工具栏按钮，和按钮的外观会发生变化。When the property is set to `false`, the toolbar button cannot be clicked, and the button's appearance changes. 和分配给该按钮显示为灰色。如果图像或文本具有多个颜色，则它们将显示在为单一的灰色。The and assigned to the button appear grayed out. If the image or text has multiple colors, they display in a monochromatic gray.

value.span: 分配给工具栏按钮的 的索引值。

span.span: The index value of the assigned to the toolbar button.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值引用中的映像的索引的值分配给父控件。The value references the indexed value of the images in an assigned to the parent control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的常见属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要， ，和已创建与至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用按钮名称作为键来检索从集合控件。You can use the button name as a key to retrieve the from the collection of a control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PartialPush { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示切换式工具栏按钮是否为部分按下状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a toggle-style toolbar button is partially pushed.

value.span: 如果切换式工具栏按钮为部分按下状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a toggle-style toolbar button is partially pushed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`true`，工具栏按钮显示为具有灰其图标。When is set to `true`, the toolbar button appears to have its face grayed. 此外观会不同于为灰色外观时属性设置为`false`由于部分推送外观将呈现模糊状态赋予整个按钮。This appearance is different from the dimmed appearance when the property is set to `false` since the partial-push appearance gives a haze to the entire button face. 此属性无任何效果，除非设置为`ToggleButton`。This property has no effect unless the is set to `ToggleButton`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含控件称为`RichTextBox1`。调用`InitializeToolBar`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `RichTextBox1`.Call the `InitializeToolBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: if a toggle-style toolbar button is currently in the pushed state; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`true`，工具栏按钮是否显示凹陷或嵌入相对于其他按钮的状态。When is set to `true`, the toolbar button appears sunken or inset relative to the other buttons. 此属性无任何效果，除非设置为`ToggleButton`。This property has no effect unless the is set to `ToggleButton`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含控件称为`RichTextBox1`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `RichTextBox1`. 调用`InitializeToolBar`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeToolBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Rectangle As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle Rectangle { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

summary.span: 获取工具栏按钮的边框。

span.span: Gets the bounding rectangle for a toolbar button.
The bounding for a toolbar button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果和当前按钮均，则此属性检索按钮中当前所包含的绑定矩形。If the and the current button are both , then this property retrieves the bounding rectangle the button is currently contained in.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::ToolBarButtonStyle Style { System::Windows::Forms::ToolBarButtonStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::ToolBarButtonStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置工具栏按钮的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the toolbar button.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果按钮设置为可以指定按下的下拉列表按钮时显示。If the button is set to you can specify a to be displayed when the drop-down button is pressed. 如果 style 设为`ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`，工具栏按钮是否显示为一个按钮分隔符，而不是一个按钮。If the style is set to `ToolBarButtonStyle.Separator`, the toolbar button appears as a button separator and not as a button. `ToolBarButtonStyle.ToggleButton`样式使工具栏按钮充当切换按钮; 它可以在打开或关闭状态。The `ToolBarButtonStyle.ToggleButton` style causes the toolbar button to act like a toggle button; it can be in an on or off state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的常见属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要， ，和已创建与至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The assigned value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Tag { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含有关工具栏按钮的数据的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the toolbar button.

value.span: 包含有关工具栏按钮的数据的 。

span.span: An that contains data about the toolbar button.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索或分配与工具栏按钮当前关联的数据。Retrieves or assigns the data currently associated with the toolbar button. 任何派生的类型可以分配给此属性。Any derived type can be assigned to this property. 如果通过 Windows 窗体设计器设置此属性，可以分配纯文本。If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含控件称为`RichTextBox1`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `RichTextBox1`. 调用`InitializeToolBar`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeToolBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButtonExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在工具栏按钮上的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text displayed on the toolbar button.

value.span: 显示在工具栏按钮上的文本。

span.span: The text displayed on the toolbar button.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值的文本属性值为空字符串 ("") 除非你创建具有控件接受文本字符串作为参数的构造函数。The default the Text property value is an empty string ("") unless you created the control with the constructor that accepts the text string as a parameter. 工具栏按钮上的文本的方向由按钮的父属性，后者可被设置为之一枚举值。The orientation of the text on the toolbar button is determined by the property of the button's parent , which can be set to one of the enumeration values. 方向是相对于分配给按钮的图像。The orientation is in relation to the image assigned to the button. 如果没有图像分配给按钮，将有空间留下一个工具栏按钮的图面上。If no image is assigned to the button, there will be space left for one on the surface of the toolbar button. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的常见属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要， ，和已创建与至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTipText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置显示为该按钮的工具提示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears as a ToolTip for the button.

value.span: 当鼠标指针在工具栏按钮上移动时所显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed when the mouse pointer moves over the toolbar button.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要启用的工具提示文本的显示，当鼠标指针移到按钮上方时，将设置按钮的父属性到`true`。To enable the display of the ToolTip text when the mouse pointer is moved over the button, set the property of the button's parent to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建和三个控件，将这些按钮分配到工具栏，并设置一些按钮的常见属性。The following code example creates a and three controls, assigns the buttons to the toolbar, and sets some of the buttons' common properties. 此代码需要， ，和已创建与至少有一个分配给它。This code requires that a , , and a have been created and the has at least one assigned to it. [!code-cpp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ToolBarButton.Style Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

returns.span: 表示当前 的字符串。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Visible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏按钮是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the toolbar button is visible.

value.span: 如果工具栏按钮是可见的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the toolbar button is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工具栏按钮不可见，它将不会显示在工具栏上，并因此无法接收用户输入。If the toolbar button is not visible, it will not be displayed on the toolbar, and therefore cannot receive user input.
